clinical_study.brief_title: The Role of Convex Skin Barrier in Prevention of Peristomy Skin Complication─Randomized Controlled Trial
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of Convex Skin Barrier in Prevention of Peristomy Skin Complication─Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The incidence of peristomy skin complication ranges from 15% to 65%. It is a serious issue and problem for patients care.The type of skin barrier is associated with peristomy skin complication. How to choose suitable skin barrier is important.

intervention.description: Total 300 patients and grouping in 1:1 ratio.(1)peristomy skin complication (30 mins) (2)life quality stomy care (3-5 mins) (3)stomy appliance satisfaction (3-5 mins)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age>20
- Receive colostomy or ileostomy
- Agree to join the trial and sign the informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- Liver cirrhosis
- Renal insufficiency
- Severe malnutrition
- Unstable vital sign
- Not suitable after evaluation by Principal Investigator
